title: Best of Patreon: July 2022
description:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of July. Subscribe today to get full segments plus hundreds of hours of past content.

You'll hear:
• True Crime Headlines: Update on Kristin Smart
• True Crime Headlines: Petito Family Lawsuit
• Off My Chest: Clown Party Foul
• Live Q&A: Fun in the Chat and Broken Household Items
• Livestream Am I The Asshole?: GPS inside Raggedy Ann
If you like what you hear and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits to subscribe today! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
